description.intro: Hi, I'm Jonas! I have been identified as one of Udemy's Top Instructors and all my premium courses have recently earned the best-selling status for outstanding performance and student satisfaction.
description.skills: I'm a full-stack web developer and designer with a passion for building beautiful things from scratch. I've been building websites and apps since 2007 and also have a Masters degree in Engineering.
description.important: Do you want to learn how to build awesome websites with advanced HTML and CSS? Looking for a complete JavaScript course that takes you from beginner to advanced developer?
